content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Pipe network at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5) and a pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity network at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Examples: burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0), burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them.
- Example: stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that boilers have fuel before using them.
- Example: boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before using them.
- Example: steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before using them.
- Example: electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them.
- Example: pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty before using them.
- Example: belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
